lead_paragraph: The move is the latest turn in the scandal involving unauthorized spending at the City University of New York, the largest public urban university in the country.

headline.print_headline: Report Spurs CUNY to End Its Contracts for Lobbyists
headline.main: Report Spurs CUNY to End Its Contracts With Outside Lobbyists

snippet: The move is the latest turn in the scandal involving unauthorized spending at the City University of New York, the largest public urban university in the country....
abstract: City University of New York terminates their contracts with outside lobbyists after report from office of State Inspector General Catherine Leahy Scott revealed system 'ripe for abuse'; report singles out $1.6 million in money spent on lobbyists, calling it redundant, since school already employed governmental relations people on staff.
